name: Krieg
description: Built from the ground up for VR, Krieg is a team-based fantasy multiplayer competitive game. Thrown into the middle of a war between The King's Army and The Ancients, only the strongest will survive. This war of epic mercenaries and guardians will decide the fate of the realm.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel i5-4590 Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel i7-4770 Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1080 DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 1500 MB available space
